mapper.insert: insert into t_community (useridx, commtype, title, content, regDT) values (#{useridx}, #{commtype}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select:
SELECT c.idx, ct.type AS commtype, c.title, DATE_FORMAT(c.regDT, '%y.%m.%d') AS regDT, c.hit FROM t_community c JOIN t_communitytype ct ON c.commtype = ct.code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comm_idx, COUNT(*) AS commentCount, MAX(regDT) AS lastCommentDT FROM t_comment GROUP BY comm_idx ) com ON c.idx = com.comm_idx WHERE c.delState = 0
AND c.commtype = #{commtype}
AND c.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND c.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (c.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR c.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY
c.regDT DESC com.lastCommentDT DESC com.commentCount DESC c.hit DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

mapper.select: SELECT c.idx, ct.type AS commtype, c.title, c.content, DATE_FORMAT(c.regDT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDT, c.hit, u.userid AS userid FROM t_community c LEFT JOIN t_user u ON c.useridx = u.idx LEFT JOIN t_communitytype ct ON c.commtype = ct.code WHERE c.idx = #{idx} -- idx에 해당하는 항목 조회
